fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Obscure a Striked player, secretly removing the Strike and learning their role.
- Prepare a Strike on a player. Strikes will activate the following morning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You learn the faction of every Striked player.
- Obscuring a player means they receive no night feedback, and you instead learn it.
- If two or more Striked players are alive, you gain basic defense.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all who stand against the Thundercry
